dataJson.description: A project built for freecodecamp.com in 2016, the requirement then were to build a random quote machine
dataJson.name: Random Quote Machine
dataJson.story: After all I have done until this point, the next projects seemed like taking kandy from a child. A quote generator was the first one I had to tackle. It takes quotes from an array and displays them. I have used Material UI because it is so easy to make simple pages like this one without getting to much  into design. One thing I have tried and and was successful at implementing was a check that the newly generated quote does not match the previously one, or the "NEW QUOTE" button would seem unresponsive.

techs.description: A programming language used for scripting web browser
techs.name: Javascript

techs.description: A library for responsive web design by Google, ported from the Android framework set of guides about UI
techs.name: Material UI
